meanings.definition: Incorrectly packaging goods for sale or shipment.
meanings.sent1: The mispackaging of the items led to customer complaints.
meanings.sent2: The mispackaging of the products resulted in delays in delivery.
meanings.sent3: The mispackaging mishap caused quite a mix-up at the warehouse.
meanings.sent4: The mispackaging was a puzzle that took hours to unravel.
meanings.sent5: The mispackaging error stood out like a sore thumb among the neatly packed boxes.

meanings.definition: The act of packaging something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: We discovered the mispackaging during the inventory check.
meanings.sent2: The mispackaging was a costly mistake for the company.
meanings.sent3: The mispackaging incident made everyone double-check their work.
meanings.sent4: The mispackaging problem snowballed into a major issue.
meanings.sent5: The mispackaging flaw was hard to miss among the properly packaged items.

meanings.definition: To package something in a mistaken or faulty manner.
meanings.sent1: Please do not mispackage the fragile items.
meanings.sent2: The worker mispackaged the order due to inattention.
meanings.sent3: He mispackaged the gift, turning it into a comical surprise.
meanings.sent4: Mispackaging can lead to unnecessary returns and refunds.
meanings.sent5: She mispackaged the items, creating chaos in the shipping department.
